title: I have no access to the unlimited virgin media Ireland data from my pay plan. How do i get my data
content:
I can't get access to my virgin media unlimited data. Have i accidentally switched off my data, if so how to I get access again. I have no problem with making receiving calls or texts. The phone works fine when I've wifi but when I'm away from the house I can't access the internet. I only have the phone awhile and can't guarantee that I had access to my data plan from the get go. Had anyone else had this problem.
Thanks,
Gary, Ireland
